title: Students | MIT CSAIL
content: CSAIL students are clever, colorful, collaborative and slightly crazy! There's a vibrant student life at the lab, with events ranging from the CSAIL Olympics to Friday Game Nights. (Oh, and make sure to sign up for the free-food listserv.) Student groups play a big role in the life of both graduate and undergraduate students.  Visit their pages to get involved! Massachusetts Institute of Technology Computer Science & Artificial Intelligence Laboratory 32 Vassar St, Cambridge MA 02139
